author: Special Correspondent
text:
The fifth annual book fair would be held at Perambalur from January 29 to February 7.

The book fair will be held at the Municipal grounds near the new bus stand in the town.

To mark the fifth year of the event, short story and poetry writing competitions will be held. They would be open only for residents of Perambalur district. Entries should be e-mailed toadmin @perambalurbookfair.inor sent by registered, speed post, or couriered to Makkal Sindhanai Peravai, 175F/12K, Raja Nagar First Street, Thuraimangalam, Perambalur 621220.
